entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 8.
